subject: Configure Vercel for API-only deployment, remove unused favicons
body:
This is a pure serverless API with no frontend â€” favicons were never
referenced by any code. Instead of keeping dead static files to satisfy
Vercel's output directory check, configure vercel.json properly:
- "framework": null declares no frontend framework
- "buildCommand": "" skips the build step entirely, so Vercel never
  looks for an output directory

Replaces the workaround from 7fc7936 that moved favicons to public/.

https://claude.ai/code/session_018GdxVNVycPS8x1KTytw3hi
title: Configure Vercel for API-only deployment, remove unused favicons
